alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 4:44PM MDT until May 11 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 443 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of The Saunders Elevator to 14 miles north of Keyes, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walsh and Stonington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
